description: Returns an array of edge configurations associated with the specified Edge Agent. In the request, you must specify the Edge Agent HubDeviceArn.

parameters.name: HubDeviceArn
parameters.description: The 'Internet of Things (IoT) Thing' Arn of the edge agent.

nested_items.name: EdgeConfigs
nested_items.description: A description of a single stream's edge configuration.

nested_items.name: StreamName
nested_items.description: The name of the stream.

nested_items.name: StreamARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the stream.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the stream first created the edge config.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the stream last updated the edge config.

nested_items.name: SyncStatus
nested_items.description: The current sync status of the stream's edge configuration.

nested_items.name: FailedStatusDetails
nested_items.description: A description of the generated failure status.

nested_items.name: EdgeConfig
nested_items.description: A description of the stream's edge configuration that will be used to sync with the Edge Agent IoT Greengrass component. The Edge Agent component will run on an IoT Hub Device setup at your premise.

nested_items.name: HubDeviceArn
nested_items.description: The 'Internet of Things (IoT) Thing' Arn of the stream.

nested_items.name: RecorderConfig
nested_items.description: The recorder configuration consists of the local MediaSourceConfig details, that are used as credentials to access the local media files streamed on the camera.

nested_items.name: MediaSourceConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration details that consist of the credentials required ( MediaUriSecretArn and MediaUriType) to access the media files streamed to the camera.

nested_items.name: MediaUriSecretArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager ARN for the username and password of the camera, or a local media file location.

nested_items.name: MediaUriType
nested_items.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) type. The FILE_URI value can be used to stream local media files.

nested_items.name: ScheduleConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration that consists of the ScheduleExpression and the DurationInMinutes details that specify the scheduling to record from a camera, or local media file, onto the Edge Agent. If the ScheduleExpression attribute is not provided, then the Edge Agent will always be set to recording mode.

nested_items.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_items.description: The Quartz cron expression that takes care of scheduling jobs to record from the camera, or local media file, onto the Edge Agent. If the ScheduleExpression is not provided for the RecorderConfig, then the Edge Agent will always be set to recording mode.

nested_items.name: DurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: The total duration to record the media. If the ScheduleExpression attribute is provided, then the DurationInSeconds attribute should also be specified.

nested_items.name: UploaderConfig
nested_items.description: The uploader configuration contains the ScheduleExpression details that are used to schedule upload jobs for the recorded media files from the Edge Agent to a Kinesis Video Stream.

nested_items.name: ScheduleConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration that consists of the ScheduleExpression and the DurationInMinutes details that specify the scheduling to record from a camera, or local media file, onto the Edge Agent. If the ScheduleConfig is not provided in this UploaderConfig, then the Edge Agent will upload at regular intervals (every 1 hour).

nested_items.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_items.description: The Quartz cron expression that takes care of scheduling jobs to record from the camera, or local media file, onto the Edge Agent. If the ScheduleExpression is not provided for the RecorderConfig, then the Edge Agent will always be set to recording mode.

nested_items.name: DurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: The total duration to record the media. If the ScheduleExpression attribute is provided, then the DurationInSeconds attribute should also be specified.

nested_items.name: DeletionConfig
nested_items.description: The deletion configuration is made up of the retention time ( EdgeRetentionInHours) and local size configuration ( LocalSizeConfig) details that are used to make the deletion.

nested_items.name: EdgeRetentionInHours
nested_items.description: The number of hours that you want to retain the data in the stream on the Edge Agent. The default value of the retention time is 720 hours, which translates to 30 days.

nested_items.name: LocalSizeConfig
nested_items.description: The value of the local size required in order to delete the edge configuration.

nested_items.name: MaxLocalMediaSizeInMB
nested_items.description: The overall maximum size of the media that you want to store for a stream on the Edge Agent.

nested_items.name: StrategyOnFullSize
nested_items.description: The strategy to perform when a stream's MaxLocalMediaSizeInMB limit is reached.

nested_items.name: DeleteAfterUpload
nested_items.description: The boolean value used to indicate whether or not you want to mark the media for deletion, once it has been uploaded to the Kinesis Video Stream cloud. The media files can be deleted if any of the deletion configuration values are set to true, such as when the limit for the EdgeRetentionInHours, or the MaxLocalMediaSizeInMB, has been reached.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, the call returns this element with a given token. To get the next batch of edge configurations, use this token in your next request.
